The Control Center from @stackbithq is brilliant! A great example of using @Netlify's Snippet Injection (https://t.co/FjteBneI84) and APIs (https://t.co/EJZQAzOidB) along with @sanity_io to bring admin of your sites right into focus. https://t.co/a5GWGOHLIK https://t.co/JIRdPtvmgw
